title: won't let me log onto my account
body: when i tried to log onto my league account it wouldn't let me and when i sent in the email recovery it gave me the wrong sign in and password as well can someone help me?

replies.body: We'd be happy to help with recovering your account!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our account team can help out individually.  We'll respond asap to get you back in game!
